title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 540 - Expiration Of Certificates Of Authority And Registration Renewals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 540 - Expiration Of Certificates Of Authority And Registration Renewals

State Regulations
§ 540.1 - Registration renewal
§ 540.2 - Notice of expiration
§ 540.3 - Refusal to issue a certificate of authority
§ 540.4 - Protest procedure
§ 540.5 - Surrender of certificates of authority
§ 540.6 - Penalty for conducting a business without possessing a valid certificate of authority

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 540

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 1132[c], 1134, 1142, 1145, 1147, 1817

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
